string-array.name: cards_promo
string-array.item: Black Market;Add cards from outside the supply pile.;3;0;Action;Black Market;0;0;0;2;0;0
Stash;When you shuffle, you may put this anywhere in your deck.;5;0;Treasure;Stash;0;0;0;2;0;0
Envoy;Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. The player to your left chooses 1 for you to discard. Draw the rest.;4;0;Action;Envoy;0;0;0;0;0;0
Walled Village;You can re-play this card in set circumstances.;4;0;Action;Walled Village;0;2;1;0;0;0

resources.string: Prince;Choose an Action card costing 4 or less. You play that card for free every turn. Set Prince aside.;8;0;Action;Prince;0;0;0;0;0;0
